NzFaceLessManMod.XenoGeneTemplateDef.label: Gene: {0}
NzFaceLessManMod.XenoGeneTemplateDef.description: Carriers of this gene have the extraordinary archite-powered ability to rapidly morph into a {0} xenotype at will. They will inherit all the genetic abilities and drawbacks of that xenotype, but they will be able to morph back at any time.
